src.processes.status module¶

src.processes.status.map_status(wps_status, compliant='STATUS_COMPLIANT_OGC')[source]¶

Maps WPS statuses (twitcher.status, OWSLib or PyWPS) to OWSLib/PyWPS compatible values. For each compliant combination, unsupported statuses are changed to corresponding ones (with closest logical match). Statuses are returned with twitcher.status.job_status_values format (lowercase and not preceded by ‘Process’).

Parameters:
  • wps_status – one of twitcher.status.job_status_values to map to compliant standard or PyWPS int status.
  • compliant – one of STATUS_COMPLIANT_[...] values.
Returns:

mapped status complying to the requested compliant category, or STATUS_UNKNOWN if no match found.

src.processes.types module¶

src.processes.utils.get_base_url(settings)[source]¶

src.processes.wps module¶

pywps 4.x wrapper

src.processes.wps.get_wps_cfg_path(settings)[source]¶

Retrieves the WPS configuration file (wps.cfg by default or src.wps_cfg if specified).

src.processes.wps.get_wps_output_path(settings)[source]¶

Retrieves the WPS output path directory where to write XML and result files. Searches directly in settings, then src.wps_cfg file, or finally, uses the default values if not found.

src.processes.wps.get_wps_output_url(settings)[source]¶

Retrieves the WPS output URL that maps to WPS output path directory. Searches directly in settings, then src.wps_cfg file, or finally, uses the default values if not found.

src.processes.wps.get_wps_path(settings)[source]¶

Retrieves the WPS path (without hostname). Searches directly in settings, then src.wps_cfg file, or finally, uses the default values if not found.

src.processes.wps.get_wps_url(settings)[source]¶

Retrieves the full WPS URL (hostname + WPS path). Searches directly in settings, then src.wps_cfg file, or finally, uses the default values if not found.
